plot: Charmcaster breaks her Uncle Hex out of prison to help him find the Keystone of Bazell and punish the one who got him imprisoned - Lucky Girl.

At a magic convention in Las Vegas, Gwen comes across the Keystone of Bezel, enabling her to, once again, return as Lucky Girl. Hex, newly escaped from prison and accompanied by his niece Charmcaster, is soon on the scene. He demands the Keystone by which he means to incant the return of the five charms Gwen previously destroyed before destroying her.—statmanjeff
